text:
@NinjaEconomics Dear God! First of all he calls it the influenza spreading around, then it’s the Coronavirus...and no it does not work. 
Coffee for the last days? Who wants coffee if it’s the end of time? How are you gonna make it if the power is out? Trade it for a car...why?
